participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is enthusiastic and family-oriented, always eager to share her experiences.
participant_1.background: i just bought a house recently. i eat a raw diet. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i am married with two kids. i am an economics major.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Robert is wise and adventurous, with a passion for exploring new cultures.
participant_2.background: i have visited spain a times. i think i'll retire in a few years. i really like to travel. i'm a librarian. i'm 60years old.
